newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Metro Pacific to double capital. [corrected 09:50 gmt]
newsitem.headline: Metro Pacific to double capital. [corrected 09:50 gmt]

text.p: The board of directors of Metro Pacific Corp has approved the doubling of the company's authorised capital stock to ten billion pesos from five billion pesos, the company said in a statement on Monday.
Metro Pacific, a diversified concern, is the flagship unit of Hong Kong's First Pacific Co Ltd.
The new capital structure will be divided into nine billion common shares and one billion preferred shares, the company said in the statement submitted to the Securities and Exchange Commission.
The previous structure had four billion common (corrects type of share from "preferred") and one billion preferred shares.
